A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi (TLJ) is a Star Wars movie unlike any other Star Wars movie. There is a very fine balance between introducing something new and also keeping true to the lore. TLJ does this with great finesse. It is the kind of movie you want to re-watch immediately.

There was good character development while introducing a couple of new ones.

Sets and costumes were unique but also keeping with that Star Wars theme.

TLJ met and exceeded my expectations. It is easy to set the bar high and if you are remotely interested in the Star Wars universe this one is not to be missed.
